channel.title: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!" - Ready for Boom

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
item.content:encoded: WE ARE FULL! and have summoned the portal of awesome. no longer accepting applications

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
item.content:encoded: 3 more spots left. Join fast!

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
item.content:encoded: 9 more spots left before we explode. come join now

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
item.content:encoded: 17-18 more villagers. come join

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is Ready to EXPLODE!!!
item.content:encoded: Fraternity is ready to Go IM and explode after today. Come join now to get STI after i defeat the portal of awesome. Join Now!!!!

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is close to going IM
item.content:encoded: Fraternity now has Epic Monument and you can become sannin here. We are 5 kaiju upgrades away from completing the IM. Come join today!

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is close to going IM
item.content:encoded: We need just 9 more kaiju uprades and epic monument then i can do the IM. Come join today to get in on the monster drops we get from the kaiju

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: We now have tools of the trade and about to start getting the 40+ upgrades group of upgrades in a few days. Come join today. Not too long until we start enticing kaiju ^_^

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: we now have 28 people and we have NRF, ninja cooking school, burger ninja, and jonin council. Soon to get tools of the trade. Come join today. I am now going to do the IM This season now that i can get full moon. all i need are the people and upgrades.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded:
We now have jonin council and ingredient collecting. Come join today!

P.S. still planning for the IM after i loop.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Fraternity Village is now getting jonin council tomorrow. So if you are special jonin looking to become jonin come join. I still plan to rush IM after i loop.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: We are now at 12 people and have entered the war, i need more villagers to get jonin council but now invasions will make the village grow faster and allow me to rush for the IM faster than what i was doing. Come Join Fraternity Village if you have an alt that is village-less or is wanting to help a village become an immortal realm a little faster. thanx in advance.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Ok the village now has 7 people and 6 upgrades i have allowed wandering genin so people should join soon. I need just 3 more people though till war council and enter the war, i have hourglasses and timespheres saved up so things should go fast then. COME JOIN FRATERNITY!!!

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: so can i expect an alt from both of you? i plan to rush to IM as fast as possible and as soon as i can allow wandering genin the faster my village can grow. Looking forward to it.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Yes i plan to do the IM but first i have to get 70+ upgrades and a portion kaiju upgrades to do the IM. i am S4 so i already have all the 3 sannin themes needed and plan to get the tote as soon as i can bingo people. which isnt possible till i have war council. I will not be able to do the IM till next season as i have wheel of cheese and need a full moon but my seasons go fast now. But like i said aside from the Tote, upgrades, and full moon. i have everything needed to do the IM. So the faster i can get villagers, the faster i can do the impossible mission. it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: are you at the point that you only need people to do the IM mission? if so i can send one of my alts to your village to help out

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: hi if u are going to do the impossible mission i would like to join

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Fraternity Village is still in need of members! We have the resources and ryo for the next few upgrades but need the people. come join. only a 3% tax rate. Village ryo close to 1 mil. come join!

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: We are at 3 people only and need more to enter the war. We have party house. hitaite maker, collection squad, and banker. come join! tax rate only 3% at the moment. All my ryo goes to the village too so we will have tons of ryo (like 530K) ^_^ i need villagers soon so please come join. Im S4 so i know what im doing. Also whenever i can. i plan to do the IM too.

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: are you planning on doing the impossible mission?

item.title: Re: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: We now have party house. Please Join.

item.title: Fraternity Villlage is recruiting
item.content:encoded: I have started a new village and i need members. I am a S4 sannin so i know what i am doing. I am a very active kage and will help when possible. Tax rate is only a tiny 2% at the moment! Come join and you won't regret it. i plan on buying upgrades as soon as possible.
